title: Consolidate Colour Palettes
description: Consolidate colour palettes used across the project. CSS files -> into `tailwind.config.ts`

title: Use Similar Logic to ProcessPickerItems
description: Consider using similar logic to processPickerItems for consistency in `src/config/external/statistics-config.tsx:82`.

title: Add Form Validation
description: Forms lack proper validation and error handling.

title: Clarify Sidebar Config TODO
description: Unspecified TODO in `src/config/internal/sidebar-config.tsx:84`, needs clarification.

title: Use Shadcn/UI Sidebar Component
description: Consider using the provided shadcn/ui component instead in `src/app/internal/_components/SidebarComponent.tsx:12`.

title: Use Consistent Status Types
description: Use consistent status types in `src/config/internal/file-flow-config.tsx:84` like in other const arrays.

title: Consolidate Types
description: Consolidate repeat or ad-hoc types into the `types/` directory. Take consolidated types and remove type duplication. Prefer moving into simple, but generic types/interfaces.

title: Flatten File Flow Config Data
description: Flatten out the data in `src/config/internal/file-flow-config.tsx:5` and ensure we're not repeating things.

title: Replace Dummy Data with Live Data
description: Replace dummy data with live backend data in `src/app/(external)/upload-portal/page.tsx:111` and `src/app/(external)/upload-portal/_components/InformationCardSet.tsx:17`.

title: Improve State Management
description: State is managed directly in components without leveraging context or proper patterns.

title: Convert Value Type in Statistics Config
description: Convert value type to more specific type in `src/config/external/statistics-config.tsx:40`.

title: Make RenderGridItems Configurable
description: Make `src/app/(external)/_components/RenderGridItems.tsx:22` intake EXTERNAL_MENU_ITEMS and map over it.

title: Implement Proper Form Handling
description: Implement proper form handling with validation in `src/app/internal/dashboard/create-news/page.tsx:3`.

title: Abstract Data Fetching to Hook
description: Move data fetching to hook->backend call from db in `src/app/(external)/news/[newsId]/page.tsx:10`.

description: Extract notification styles to utility function in `src/config/internal/notifications-config.tsx:106`.

title: Implement Dynamic Section Rendering
description: Render the sections dynamically in `src/app/internal/dashboard/user-settings/page.tsx:56`.

title: Standardize UI Component Patterns
description: Some components use shadcn/ui, others are custom.

title: Define Available Processes in Config
description: Create section in store or config for all processes that will be available in `src/store/store.ts:25`.

title: Consolidate Path Constants
description: Consolidate path constants across the application.

title: Convert Client Pages to Server Components
description: Ensure all base `page.tsx` files and any potential `layout.tsx` files are **NOT** marked as 'use client', unless _absolutely_ necessary. (Even then we should be moving the state reliance to child components)

description: Extract common utility functions in `src/app/(external)/news/[newsId]/page.tsx:13` and `src/app/(external)/news/[newsId]/page.tsx:24`.

description: Move 'state' components (use^*) to client child components in `src/app/(external)/login/page.tsx:3`.

title: Extract Inline Functions
description: Remove or simplify similar or duplicate (mostly inline) functions where possible to `lib/` or `hooks/` as semi-generic implementations.
